alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 08 at 11:42AM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Snowmelt and increased reservoir releases will keep river flows along the East Walker elevated with minor flooding ongoing. Runoff of rainfall from thunderstorms into tributaries above and below Strosnider Ditch could further exacerbate river flows. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and will continue. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.8 feet, Moderate flooding in reach. East Walker Road and other low rural roads likely closed at lowest points. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM PDT Thursday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM PDT Thursday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 9.3 feet. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when near riverbanks. There may also be debris within the river channel. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued by late Friday afternoon.
